NC.A: {Return Policies} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Customer Support or Loyalty Programs?

NC.A: {Return Policies} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.A: There are {0} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.
